scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Drawings for First Presbyterian Church, Park Street, Charlottesville, Virginia, by architect Louie L. Scribner include plans, sections, details, schedules, and elevations. Plans were completed with advice of Raymond H. Julian, consulting architect and J. Robert Carlton, architectural engineer.

did.unittitle: Plot plan, retaining wall details and schedules, smaller sections details; six drawings: 1 plan and 5 sections
Foundation and first floor framing plan, structural steel and concrete schedules: 2 plans
Second floor and roof framing plans; three plans, one half plan of the balcony, four sections (nave and balcony): 8 drawings
Structural details centering on the trusses and steeple, 13 truss plans, one steeple framing plan, two sections and one plan of steeple bearing: 17 drawings
Ground floor plan, ceiling framing plan, details of tower access door and fan access door: 2 plans, 2 elevations
First floor plan, second floor plan details, balcony plans, stone pattern on portico floor: 3 plans, 1 half-plan, 3 details
Door and finish schedules, door frame and trim details: 20 detail drawings, large schedule charts
Typical trim, cornice, and classroom details: 30 small detail drawings
Interior sections through the nave, narthex and balcony: 6 sections with interior elevations
Details of the nave and narthex, sections through both, elevations of nave pilasters, balustrade and door jamb details: 5 sections, 2 elevations, several smaller details
Kitchen, chapel, and toilet details: 11 small elevations, 5 details, 10 small plans
Details of library, lounge, classrooms: 9 small elevations, 1 plan, 13 details (including doors, jambs)
Stair and catwalk details; six small plans, one large section through nave attic showing framing, catwalks, and light fixtures locations: 10 smaller sections (stairs, catwalks)
Wall sections and miscellaneous exterior details: 6 big sections, 4 smaller ones, 2 details, 1 plan
Exterior elevations of the nave: north and west elevations, south sectional elevation, retaining wall: 4 drawings, all 1/8=1'0" scale
Exterior elevations

scopecontent.p: East sectional elevation of administration link and back of nave, west sectional elevation of fellowship hall, east elevation of fellowship hall, south elevation of classroom wing, south elevation of area retaining wall, north elevation of fellowship hall and classroom wing, north elevation of chapel, all at 1/8:=1'0" scale

did.unittitle: Window details, including elevations of different types: 20 sectional details
Exterior door details: 4 large sectional details, 4 small elevations of different door types

Exterior doors, steeple and cupola details: eight door details, three door elevations, large half section/half elevation of steeple, six small sections, half section/half elevation of cupola, plan and section entry vestibule, jamb detail
